shortdesc.ph: Stops or resumes subscribing to the audio streams of all remote users.

p.codeblock: public abstract int muteAllRemoteAudioStreamsEx(boolean muted, RtcConnection connection);
virtual int muteAllRemoteAudioStreamsEx(bool mute, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;
public abstract int MuteAllRemoteAudioStreamsEx(bool mute, RtcConnection connection);
Future<void> muteAllRemoteAudioStreamsEx( {required bool mute, required RtcConnection connection});

section.p: After successfully calling this method, the local user stops or resumes subscribing to the audio streams of all remote users, including the ones join the channel subsequent to this call.

ul.li: Call this method after joining a channel.
If you do not want to subscribe the audio streams of remote users before joining a channel, you can set autoSubscribeAudio as when calling .

li.ph: See recommended settings in Set the Subscribing State.

pt.props: ios mac cpp unity flutter rn electron

pd.p:
Whether to stop subscribing to the audio streams of all remote users:
: Stops subscribing to the audio streams of all remote users.
: (Default) Subscribes to the audio streams of all remote users by default.
